BANNER_SLIDER.description: Allowing Certification Issuers to provide unique and untampered-with certifications fast
Allowing Certification Holders to show/proof their certifications easily and securly
Making it easy to integrate documents with the upcoming Web3
Stopping document forgery and ownership manuipulation using the blockchain technology

BANNER.title: Decentralized Certifications and document anti-forgery
BANNER.description: A decentralized alternative to certificate verification and notarization which helps certificate Verifiers check the authenticity of certificates or documents issued by a given Issuer to the Holder of the given document.

HOW_IT_WORKS.subTitle: How it works
HOW_IT_WORKS.title: Compact solution built on the blockchain
HOW_IT_WORKS.description: Revolutionary way into transforming ceritications and diplomas into unique NFTs

bullets.title: Create them
bullets.description: An easy to use UI to create certifications that will be uniquely identified and unchanged

bullets.title: Mint them
bullets.description: Each certificaiton created will be minted on the blockchain and can only verified by the creator

bullets.title: Issue & Show
bullets.description: The certification will be issued to an address, where its owner can see the certification as a form of an NFT

bullets.title: Use & Verify
bullets.description: When you have a cerificate on your wallet, you can showcase securly and in realtime

FAQ.title: How to contact with Customer Service?
FAQ.description: Our Customer Experience Team is available 7 days a week and we offer 2 ways to get in contact.Email and Chat . We try to reply quickly, so you need not to wait too long for a response!.

FAQ.title: App installation failed, how to update system information?
FAQ.description: Please read the documentation carefully . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

FAQ.title: Website reponse taking time, how to improve?
FAQ.description: At first, Please check your internet connection . We also have some online  video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum .

FAQ.title: New update fixed all bug and issues?
FAQ.description: We are giving the update of this theme continuously . You will receive an email Notification when we push an update. Always try to be updated with us .

The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
